users.name: Afghanistan
users.info: officially the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, is a landlocked country located at the crossroads of Central Asia and South Asia.

users.name: Albania
users.info: officially the Republic of Albania, is a country in Southeastern Europe.

users.name: Algeria
users.info: officially the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria, is a country in North Africa.

users.name: Andorra
users.info: officially the Principality of Andorra, is a sovereign landlocked microstate on the Iberian Peninsula, in the eastern Pyrenees, bordered by France to the north and Spain to the south.

users.name: Angola
users.info: officially the Republic of Angola, is a country located on the west coast of central-southern Africa.

users.name: Antigua and Barbuda
users.info: is a sovereign country in the West Indies. It lies at the juncture of the Caribbean Sea and the Atlantic Ocean in the Leeward Islands part of the Lesser Antilles, at 17°N latitude.

users.name: Argentina
users.info: officially the Argentine Republic, is a country in the southern half of South America.

users.name: Armenia
users.info: officially the Republic of Armenia, is a landlocked country in the Armenian Highlands of Western Asia.

users.name: Australia
users.info: officially the Commonwealth of Australia, is a sovereign country comprising the mainland of the Australian continent, the island of Tasmania, and numerous smaller islands.

users.name: Austria
users.info: The Republic of Austria, commonly just Austria, is a country in the southern part of Central Europe, lying in the Eastern Alps.

users.name: Azerbaijan
users.info: officially the Republic of Azerbaijan, is a transcontinental country located at the boundary of Eastern Europe and Western Asia.

users.name: Bahamas
users.info: officially the Commonwealth of The Bahamas, is an island country within the Lucayan Archipelago of the West Indies in the North Atlantic.

users.name: Bahrain
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Bahrain, is an island country in Western Asia.

users.name: Bangladesh
users.info: officially the People's Republic of Bangladesh, is a country in South Asia.

users.name: Barbados
users.info: is an island country in the Lesser Antilles of the West Indies, in the Caribbean region of the Americas, and the most easterly of the Caribbean Islands.

users.name: Belarus
users.info: officially the Republic of Belarus, is a landlocked country in Eastern Europe.

users.name: Belgium
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Belgium, is a country in Northwestern Europe.

users.name: Belize
users.info: is a Caribbean and Central American country on the northeastern coast of Central America.

users.name: Benin
users.info: officially the Republic of Benin , and formerly Dahomey, is a country in West Africa.

users.name: Bhutan
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Bhutan, is a landlocked country in South Asia. It is situated in the Eastern Himalayas, between China in the north and India in the south.

users.name: Bolivia
users.info: officially the Plurinational State of Bolivia, is a landlocked country located in western-central South America.

users.name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
users.info: sometimes called Bosnia–Herzegovina and often known informally as Bosnia, is a country at the crossroads of south and southeast Europe, located in the Balkans.

users.name: Botswana
users.info: is a landlocked country in Southern Africa. Botswana is topographically flat, with approximately 70 percent of its territory being the Kalahari Desert.

users.name: Brazil
users.info: officially the Federative Republic of Brazil, is the largest country in both South America and Latin America.

users.name: Brunei
users.info: is a country located on the north coast of the island of Borneo in Southeast Asia. Apart from its South China Sea coast, it is completely surrounded by the Malaysian state of Sarawak.

users.name: Bulgaria
users.info: is a country located on the north coast of the island of Borneo in Southeast Asia. Apart from its South China Sea coast, it is completely surrounded by the Malaysian state of Sarawak.

users.name: Burkina Faso
users.info: is a landlocked country in West Africa with an area of 274,200 km2 (105,900 sq mi), bordered by Mali to the northwest, Niger to the northeast, Benin to the southeast, Togo and Ghana to the south, and the Ivory Coast to the southwest.

users.name: Burundi
users.info: is a landlocked country in the Great Rift Valley at the junction between the African Great Lakes region and East Africa.

users.name: Ivory Coast
users.info: also known as Côte d'Ivoire, officially the Republic of Côte d'Ivoire, is a country on the southern coast of West Africa.

users.name: Cabo Verde
users.info: officially the Republic of Cabo Verde, is an archipelago and island country in the central Atlantic Ocean, consisting of ten volcanic islands with a combined land area of about 4,033 square kilometres (1,557 sq mi).

users.name: Cambodia
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Cambodia, is a country located in the southern portion of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia.

users.name: Cameroon
users.info: officially the Republic of Cameroon (French: République du Cameroun), is a country in west-central Africa.

users.name: Canada
users.info: is a country in North America. Its ten provinces and three territories extend from the Atlantic Ocean to the Pacific Ocean and northward into the Arctic Ocean.

users.name: CAR
users.info: The Central African Republic (CAR) is a landlocked country in Central Africa. It is bordered by Chad to the north, Sudan to the northeast, South Sudan to the southeast, the DR Congo to the south, the Republic of the Congo to the southwest, and Cameroon to the west.

users.name: Chile
users.info: officially the Republic of Chile, is a country in the western part of South America.

users.name: China
users.info: officially the People's Republic of China (PRC), is a country in East Asia. It is the world's most populous country, with a population exceeding 1.4 billion, slightly ahead of India.

users.name: Colombia
users.info: officially the Republic of Colombia, is a country in South America with insular regions in North America—near Nicaragua's Caribbean coast—as well as in the Pacific Ocean.

users.name: Comoros
users.info: officially the Union of the Comoros, is an independent country made up of three islands in southeastern Africa, located at the northern end of the Mozambique Channel in the Indian Ocean.

users.name: Congo
users.info: The Republic of the Congo, also known as Congo-Brazzaville, the Congo Republic or simply either Congo or the Congo, is a country located in the western coast of Central Africa to the west of the Congo river.

users.name: Costa Rica
users.info: officially the Republic of Costa Rica, is a country in the Central American region of North America, bordered by Nicaragua to the north, the Caribbean Sea to the northeast, Panama to the southeast, the Pacific Ocean to the southwest, and maritime border with Ecuador to the south of Cocos Island.

users.name: Croatia
users.info: officially the Republic of Croatia, is a country at the crossroads of Central and Southeast Europe.

users.name: Cuba
users.info: officially the Republic of Cuba, is an island country comprising the island of Cuba, as well as Isla de la Juventud and several minor archipelagos.

users.name: Cyprus
users.info: officially the Republic of Cyprus, is an island country located south of the Anatolian Peninsula in the eastern Mediterranean Sea.

users.name: Czechia
users.info: The Czech Republic, or simply Czechia, is a landlocked country in Central Europe.

users.name: Denmark
users.info: is a Nordic country in Northern Europe. It is the most populous and politically central constituent of the Kingdom of Denmark.

users.name: Djibouti
users.info: officially the Republic of Djibouti, is a country in the Horn of Africa, bordered by Somalia to the south, Ethiopia to the southwest, Eritrea in the north, and the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden to the east.

users.name: Dominica
users.info: officially the Commonwealth of Dominica, is an island country in the Caribbean.

users.name: Dominican Republic
users.info: The Dominican Republic is a country located on the island of Hispaniola in the Greater Antilles archipelago of the Caribbean region.

users.name: North Korea
users.info: officially the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), is a country in East Asia.

users.name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
users.info: The Democratic Republic of the Congo, informally Congo-Kinshasa, DR Congo, the DRC, the DROC, or the Congo, and formerly and also colloquially Zaire, is a country in Central Africa.

users.name: Ecuador
users.info: officially the Republic of Ecuador, is a country in northwestern South America

users.name: Egypt
users.info: officially the Arab Republic of Egypt, is a transcontinental country spanning the northeast corner of Africa and southwest corner of Asia via a land bridge formed by the Sinai Peninsula.

users.name: El Salvador
users.info: officially the Republic of El Salvador, is a country in Central America.

users.name: Equatorial Guinea
users.info: officially the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, is a country on the west coast of Central Africa, with an area of 28,000 square kilometres.

users.name: Eritrea
users.info: officially the State of Eritrea, is a country in the Horn of Africa region of Eastern Africa, with its capital and largest city at Asmara.

users.name: Estonia
users.info: formally the Republic of Estonia, is a country by the Baltic Sea in Northern Europe.

users.name: Eswatini
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Eswatini and formerly named Swaziland, is a landlocked country in Southern Africa.

users.name: Ethiopia
users.info: officially the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, is a landlocked country in the Horn of Africa.

users.name: Fiji
users.info: officially the Republic of Fiji, is an island country in Melanesia, part of Oceania in the South Pacific Ocean.

users.name: Finland
users.info: officially the Republic of Finland, is a Nordic country in Northern Europe.

users.name: France
users.info: is a country primarily located in Western Europe. It also comprises overseas regions and territories in the Americas and the Atlantic, Pacific and Indian Oceans.

users.name: Gabon
users.info: is a country on the west coast of Central Africa.

users.name: Gambia
users.info: The Gambia, officially the Republic of The Gambia, is a country in West Africa. It is the smallest country within mainland Africa and is surrounded by Senegal.

users.name: Georgia
users.info: is a transcontinental country at the intersection of Eastern Europe and Western Asia.

users.name: Germany
users.info: officially the Federal Republic of Germany, is a country in Central Europe. It is the second most populous country in Europe after Russia, and the most populous member state of the European Union.

users.name: Ghana
users.info: officially the Republic of Ghana, is a country in West Africa. It abuts the Gulf of Guinea and the Atlantic Ocean to the south.

users.name: Greece
users.info: officially the Hellenic Republic, is a country in Southeast Europe. It is situated on the southern tip of the Balkans, and is located at the crossroads of Europe, Asia, and Africa.

users.name: Grenada
users.info: is an island country in the West Indies in the Caribbean Sea at the southern end of the Grenadines island chain.

users.name: Guatemala
users.info: officially the Republic of Guatemala, is a country in Central America. It is bordered to the north and west by Mexico.

users.name: Guinea
users.info: officially the Republic of Guinea, is a coastal country in West Africa.

users.name: Guinea-Bissau
users.info: officially the Republic of Guinea-Bissau, is a country in West Africa that covers 36,125 square kilometres (13,948 sq mi) with an estimated population of 1,726,000.

users.name: Guyana
users.info: officially the Co‑operative Republic of Guyana, is a country on the northern mainland of South America.

users.name: Haiti
users.info: officially the Republic of Haiti and formerly known as Hayti, is a country located on the island of Hispaniola in the Greater Antilles archipelago of the Caribbean Sea, east of Cuba and Jamaica.

users.name: Holy See
users.info: The Holy See, also called the See of Rome, Petrine See or Apostolic See, is the jurisdiction of the Pope in his role as the bishop of Rome.

users.name: Honduras
users.info: officially the Republic of Honduras, is a country in Central America.

users.name: Hungary
users.info: is a landlocked country in Central Europe.

users.name: Iceland
users.info: is a Nordic island country in the North Atlantic Ocean and in the Arctic Ocean. Iceland is the most sparsely populated country in Europe.

users.name: India
users.info: officially the Republic of India, is a country in South Asia. It is the seventh-largest country by area, the second-most populous country, and the most populous democracy in the world.

users.name: Indonesia
users.info: officially the Republic of Indonesia, is a country in Southeast Asia and Oceania between the Indian and Pacific oceans. It consists of over 17,000 islands, including Sumatra, Java, Sulawesi, and parts of Borneo and New Guinea.

users.name: Iran
users.info: officially the Islamic Republic of Iran, and also called Persia, is a country located in Western Asia.

users.name: Iraq
users.info: officially the Republic of Iraq, is a country in Western Asia. It is bordered by Turkey to the north, Iran to the east, the Persian Gulf and Kuwait to the southeast, Saudi Arabia to the south, Jordan to the southwest and Syria to the west.

users.name: Ireland
users.info: is an island in the North Atlantic Ocean, in north-western Europe. It is separated from Great Britain to its east by the North Channel, the Irish Sea, and St George's Channel.

users.name: Israel
users.info: officially the State of Israel, is a country in Western Asia.

users.name: Italy
users.info: officially the Italian Republic, or the Republic of Italy, is a country in Southern Europe.

users.name: Jamaica
users.info: is an island country situated in the Caribbean Sea. Spanning 10,990 square kilometres (4,240 sq mi) in area, it is the third-largest island of the Greater Antilles and the Caribbean (after Cuba and Hispaniola).

users.name: Japan
users.info: is an island country in East Asia. It is situated in the northwest Pacific Ocean, and is bordered on the west by the Sea of Japan, while extending from the Sea of Okhotsk in the north toward the East China Sea, Philippine Sea, and Taiwan in the south.

users.name: Jordan
users.info: officially the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, is a country in Western Asia. It is situated at the crossroads of Asia, Africa, and Europe, within the Levant region, on the East Bank of the Jordan River.

users.name: Kazakhstan
users.info: officially the Republic of Kazakhstan, is a transcontinental country located mainly in Central Asia and partly in Eastern Europe.

users.name: Kenya
users.info: officially the Republic of Kenya, is a country in East Africa.

users.name: Kiribati
users.info: officially the Republic of Kiribati, is an island country in Oceania in the central Pacific Ocean.

users.name: Kuwait
users.info: officially the State of Kuwait, is a country in Western Asia.

users.name: Kyrgyzstan
users.info: or the Kyrgyz Republic, is a landlocked country in Central Asia. Kyrgyzstan is bordered by Kazakhstan to the north, Uzbekistan to the west, Tajikistan to the south, and the People's Republic of China to the east.

users.name: Laos
users.info: officially the Lao People's Democratic Republic, is a socialist state and the only landlocked country in Southeast Asia.

users.name: Latvia
users.info: officially the Republic of Latvia, is a country in the Baltic region of Northern Europe.

users.name: Lebanon
users.info: officially the Republic of Lebanon or the Lebanese Republic, is a country in Western Asia.

users.name: Lesotho
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Lesotho, is a country landlocked as an enclave in South Africa. It is situated in the Maloti Mountains and contains the highest mountains in Southern Africa.

users.name: Liberia
users.info: officially the Republic of Liberia, is a country on the West African coast. It is bordered by Sierra Leone to its northwest, Guinea to its north, Ivory Coast to its east, and the Atlantic Ocean to its south and southwest.

users.name: Libya
users.info: officially the State of Libya, is a country in the Maghreb region in North Africa.

users.name: Liechtenstein
users.info: officially the Principality of Liechtenstein, is a German-speaking microstate located in the Alps between Austria and Switzerland.

users.name: Lithuania
users.info: officially the Republic of Lithuania, is a country in the Baltic region of Europe.

users.name: Luxembourg
users.info: officially the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, is a small landlocked country in Western Europe. It borders Belgium to the west and north, Germany to the east, and France to the south.

users.name: Madagascar
users.info: officially the Republic of Madagascar, is an island country in the Indian Ocean, approximately 400 kilometres (250 miles) off the coast of East Africa across the Mozambique Channel.

users.name: Malawi
users.info: officially the Republic of Malawi, is a landlocked country in Southeastern Africa that was formerly known as Nyasaland.

users.name: Malaysia
users.info: is a country in Southeast Asia. The federal constitutional monarchy consists of thirteen states and three federal territories, separated by the South China Sea into two regions: Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo's East Malaysia.

users.name: Maldives
users.info: officially the Republic of Maldives, is an archipelagic state located in South Asia, situated in the Indian Ocean.

users.name: Mali
users.info: officially the Republic of Mali, is a landlocked country in West Africa. Mali is the eighth-largest country in Africa, with an area of over 1,240,000 square kilometres (480,000 sq mi). The population of Mali is 21.9 million.

users.name: Malta
users.info: officially the Republic of Malta, is an island country in the Mediterranean Sea.

users.name: Marshall Islands
users.info: The Marshall Islands, officially the Republic of the Marshall Islands, is an independent island country and microstate near the Equator in the Pacific Ocean, slightly west of the International Date Line.

users.name: Mauritania
users.info: officially the Islamic Republic of Mauritania, is a sovereign country in West Africa. It is bordered by the Atlantic Ocean to the west, Western Sahara to the north and northwest, Algeria to the northeast, Mali to the east and southeast, and Senegal to the southwest.

users.name: Mauritius
users.info: officially the Republic of Mauritius, is an island nation in the Indian Ocean about 2,000 kilometres (1,100 nautical miles) off the southeast coast of the African continent, east of Madagascar.

users.name: Mexico
users.info: officially the United Mexican States, is a country in the southern portion of North America.

users.name: Micronesia
users.info: is a subregion of Oceania, consisting of about 2,000 small islands in the western Pacific Ocean.

users.name: Moldova
users.info: officially the Republic of Moldova, is a landlocked country in Eastern Europe.

users.name: Monaco
users.info: officially the Principality of Monaco, is a sovereign city-state and microstate on the French Riviera a few kilometres west of the Italian region of Liguria, in Western Europe, on the Mediterranean Sea.

users.name: Mongolia
users.info: is a landlocked country in East Asia, bordered by Russia to the north and China to the south.

users.name: Montenegro
users.info: is a country in Southeastern Europe. It is a part of the Balkans and is bordered by Serbia to the northeast, Bosnia and Herzegovina to the north, Kosovo to the east, Albania to the southeast, Croatia to the northwest, and the Adriatic Sea to the west with a coastline of 293.5 km.

users.name: Morocco
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Morocco, is the westernmost country in the Maghreb region of North Africa.

users.name: Mozambique
users.info: officially the Republic of Mozambique, is a country located in southeastern Africa bordered by the Indian Ocean to the east.

users.name: Myanmar
users.info: officially the Republic of the Union of Myanmar, also known as Burma (the official name until 1989), is a country in Southeast Asia.

users.name: Namibia
users.info: officially the Republic of Namibia, is a country in Southern Africa. Its western border is the Atlantic Ocean.

users.name: Nauru
users.info: officially the Republic of Nauru and formerly known as Pleasant Island, is an island country and microstate in Oceania, in the Central Pacific.

users.name: Nepal
users.info: formerly the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal, is a landlocked country in South Asia. It is mainly situated in the Himalayas.

users.name: Netherlands
users.info: The Netherlands, informally Holland, is a country located in Northwestern Europe with overseas territories in the Caribbean. It is the largest of four constituent countries of the Kingdom of the Netherlands.

users.name: New Zealand
users.info: is an island country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean. It consists of two main landmasses—the North Island and the South Island—and over 700 smaller islands.

users.name: Nicaragua
users.info: officially the Republic of Nicaragua, is the largest country in Central America, bordered by Honduras to the north, the Caribbean to the east, Costa Rica to the south, and the Pacific Ocean to the west.

users.name: Niger
users.info: officially the Republic of the Niger, is a landlocked country in West Africa. It is a unitary state bordered by Libya to the northeast, Chad to the east, Nigeria to the south, Benin and Burkina Faso to the southwest, Mali to the west, and Algeria to the northwest.

users.name: Nigeria
users.info: officially the Federal Republic of Nigeria, is a country in West Africa. It is situated between the Sahel to the north and the Gulf of Guinea to the south in the Atlantic Ocean.

users.name: North Macedonia
users.info: officially the Republic of North Macedonia, is a country in Southeast Europe. It gained independence in 1991 as one of the successor states of Yugoslavia.

users.name: Norway
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Norway, is a Nordic country in Northern Europe, the mainland territory of which comprises the western and northernmost portion of the Scandinavian Peninsula.

users.name: Oman
users.info: officially the Sultanate of Oman, is an Arabian country located in southwestern Asia. It is situated on the southeastern coast of the Arabian Peninsula, and spans the mouth of the Persian Gulf.

users.name: Pakistan
users.info: officially the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, is a country in South Asia. It is the world's fifth-most populous country, with a population of almost 243 million people, and has the world's second-largest Muslim population just behind Indonesia.

users.name: Palau
users.info: officially the Republic of Palau and historically Belau, Palaos or Pelew, is an island country and microstate in the western Pacific.

users.name: Panama
users.info: officially the Republic of Panama, is a transcontinental country spanning the southern part of North America and the northern part of South America.

users.name: Papua New Guinea
users.info: officially the Independent State of Papua New Guinea, is a country in Oceania that comprises the eastern half of the island of New Guinea and its offshore islands in Melanesia.

users.name: Paraguay
users.info: officially the Republic of Paraguay, is a landlocked country in South America. It is bordered by Argentina to the south and southwest, Brazil to the east and northeast, and Bolivia to the northwest.

users.name: Peru
users.info: officially the Republic of Peru, is a country in western South America. It is bordered in the north by Ecuador and Colombia, in the east by Brazil, in the southeast by Bolivia, in the south by Chile, and in the south and west by the Pacific Ocean.

users.name: Philippines
users.info: officially the Republic of the Philippines, is an archipelagic country in Southeast Asia. It is situated in the western Pacific Ocean and consists of around 7,641 islands that are broadly categorized under three main geographical divisions from north to south: Luzon, Visayas, and Mindanao.

users.name: Poland
users.info: officially the Republic of Poland, is a country in Central Europe. It is divided into 16 administrative provinces called voivodeships, covering an area of 312,696 km2 (120,733 sq mi).

users.name: Portugal
users.info: officially the Portuguese Republic, is a country whose mainland is located on the Iberian Peninsula of Southwestern Europe, and whose territory also includes the Atlantic archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.

users.name: Qatar
users.info: officially the State of Qatar, is a country in Western Asia. It occupies the Qatar Peninsula on the northeastern coast of the Arabian Peninsula in the Middle East; it shares its sole land border with Saudi Arabia to the south, with the rest of its territory surrounded by the Persian Gulf.

users.name: Romania
users.info: is a country located at the crossroads of Central, Eastern, and Southeastern Europe. It borders Bulgaria to the south, Ukraine to the north, Hungary to the west, Serbia to the southwest, Moldova to the east, and the Black Sea to the southeast.

users.name: Russia
users.info: or the Russian Federation, is a transcontinental country spanning Eastern Europe and Northern Asia. It is the largest country in the world.

users.name: Rwanda
users.info: officially the Republic of Rwanda, is a landlocked country in the Great Rift Valley of Central Africa, where the African Great Lakes region and Southeast Africa converge.

users.name: Saint Kitts and Nevis
users.info: officially the Federation of Saint Christopher and Nevis, is an island country and microstate consisting of the two islands of Saint Kitts and Nevis, both located in the West Indies, in the Leeward Islands chain of the Lesser Antilles.

users.name: Saint Lucia
users.info: is an island country of the West Indies in the eastern Caribbean. The island was previously called Iouanalao and later Hewanorra, names given by the native Arawaks and Caribs, two Amerindian peoples.

users.name: Samoa
users.info: officially the Independent State of Samoa and until 1997 known as Western Samoa, is a Polynesian island country consisting of two main islands (Savai'i and Upolu); two smaller, inhabited islands (Manono and Apolima); and several smaller, uninhabited islands, including the Aleipata Islands (Nu'utele, Nu'ulua, Fanuatapu and Namua).

users.name: Sao Tome and Principe
users.info: São Tomé and Príncipe, officially the Democratic Republic of São Tomé and Príncipe, is a Portuguese-speaking island country in the Gulf of Guinea, off the western equatorial coast of Central Africa.

users.name: Senegal
users.info: officially the Republic of Senegal, is a country in West Africa, on the Atlantic Ocean coastline. Senegal is bordered by Mauritania to the north, Mali to the east, Guinea to the southeast and Guinea-Bissau to the southwest.

users.name: Serbia
users.info: officially the Republic of Serbia, is a landlocked country in Southeastern and Central Europe, situated at the crossroads of the Pannonian Basin and the Balkans.

users.name: Seychelles
users.info: officially the Republic of Seychelles, is an archipelagic state consisting of 115 islands in the Indian Ocean. Its capital and largest city, Victoria, is 1,500 kilometres (800 nautical miles) east of mainland Africa.

users.name: Sierra Leone
users.info: officially the Republic of Sierra Leone, is a country on the southwest coast of West Africa. It is bordered by Liberia to the southeast and Guinea surrounds the northern half of the nation.

users.name: Singapore
users.info: officially the Republic of Singapore, is a sovereign island country and city-state in maritime Southeast Asia.

users.name: Slovakia
users.info: officially the Slovak Republic, is a landlocked country in Central Europe. It is bordered by Poland to the north, Ukraine to the east, Hungary to the south, Austria to the southwest, and the Czech Republic to the northwest.

users.name: Slovenia
users.info: officially the Republic of Slovenia, is a country in Central Europe. It is bordered by Italy to the west, Austria to the north, Hungary to the northeast, Croatia to the southeast, and the Adriatic Sea to the southwest.

users.name: Solomon Islands
users.info: is an island country consisting of six major islands and over 900 smaller islands in Oceania, to the east of Papua New Guinea and north-west of Vanuatu.

users.name: Somalia
users.info: officially the Federal Republic of Somalia, is a country in the Horn of Africa.

users.name: South Africa
users.info: officially the Republic of South Africa (RSA), is the southernmost country in Africa. It is bounded to the south by 2,798 kilometres (1,739 mi) of coastline that stretch along the South Atlantic and Indian Oceans.

users.name: South Korea
users.info: officially the Republic of Korea (ROK), is a country in East Asia. It constitutes the southern part of the Korean Peninsula and shares a land border with North Korea.

users.name: South Sudan
users.info: officially the Republic of South Sudan, is a landlocked country in East Africa. It is bordered by Ethiopia, Sudan, Central African Republic, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Uganda and Kenya.

users.name: Spain
users.info: or the Kingdom of Spain, is a country primarily located in southwestern Europe with parts of territory in the Atlantic Ocean and across the Mediterranean Sea.

users.name: Sri Lanka
users.info: formerly known as Ceylon and officially the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, is an island country in South Asia.

users.name: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
users.info: is an island country in the Caribbean. It is located in the southeast Windward Islands of the Lesser Antilles, which lie in the West Indies at the southern end of the eastern border of the Caribbean Sea where the latter meets the Atlantic Ocean.

users.name: Palestine
users.info: officially the State of Palestine, is a state located in Western Asia. Officially governed by the Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO), it claims the West Bank, including East Jerusalem, and the Gaza Strip as its territory.

users.name: Sudan
users.info: officially the Republic of the Sudan, is a country in North East Africa.

users.name: Suriname
users.info: officially the Republic of Suriname, is a country on the northeastern Atlantic coast of South America.

users.name: Sweden
users.info: formally the Kingdom of Sweden, is a Nordic country located on the Scandinavian Peninsula in Northern Europe. It borders Norway to the west and north, Finland to the east, and is connected to Denmark in the southwest by a bridge–tunnel across the Öresund.

users.name: Switzerland
users.info: officially the Swiss Confederation, is a landlocked country located at the confluence of Western, Central and Southern Europe. It is a federal republic composed of 26 cantons, with federal authorities based in Bern.

users.name: Syria
users.info: officially the Syrian Arab Republic, is a Western Asian country located in the Eastern Mediterranean and the Levant.

users.name: Tajikistan
users.info: officially the Republic of Tajikistan, is a landlocked country in Central Asia. It has an area of 143,100 km2 (55,300 sq mi) and an estimated population of 9,749,625 people. Its capital and largest city is Dushanbe.

users.name: Tanzania
users.info: officially the United Republic of Tanzania, is a country in East Africa within the African Great Lakes region.

users.name: Thailand
users.info: historically known as Siam and officially the Kingdom of Thailand, is a country in Southeast Asia, located at the centre of the Indochinese Peninsula, spanning 513,120 square kilometres (198,120 sq mi), with a population of almost 70 million.

users.name: East Timor
users.info: also known as Timor-Leste, officially the Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste, is an island country in Southeast Asia. It comprises the eastern half of the island of Timor, the exclave of Oecusse on the island's north-western half, and the minor islands of Atauro and Jaco.

users.name: Togo
users.info: officially the Togolese Republic, is a country in West Africa. It is bordered by Ghana to the west, Benin to the east and Burkina Faso to the north.

users.name: Tonga
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Tonga, is a Polynesian country and archipelago. The country has 171 islands – of which 45 are inhabited.[1] Its total surface area is about 750 km2 (290 sq mi), scattered over 700,000 km2 (270,000 sq mi) in the southern Pacific Ocean.

users.name: Trinidad and Tobago
users.info: officially the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago, is the southernmost island country in the Caribbean. Consisting of the main islands Trinidad and Tobago, and numerous much smaller islands.

users.name: Tunisia
users.info: officially the Republic of Tunisia, is the northernmost country in Africa. It is a part of the Maghreb region of North Africa, bordered by Algeria to the west and southwest, Libya to the southeast, and the Mediterranean Sea to the north and east.

users.name: Turkey
users.info: officially the Republic of Türkiye, is a transcontinental country located mainly on the Anatolian Peninsula in Western Asia, with a small portion on the Balkan Peninsula in Southeast Europe.

users.name: Turkmenistan
users.info: is a country located in Central Asia, bordered by Kazakhstan to the northwest, Uzbekistan to the north, east and northeast, Afghanistan to the southeast, Iran to the south and southwest and the Caspian Sea to the west. Ashgabat is the capital and largest city.

users.name: Tuvalu
users.info: is an island country and microstate in the Polynesian subregion of Oceania in the Pacific Ocean. Its islands are situated about midway between Hawaii and Australia.
